metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18246 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Icinga Web 2 before 2.6.2 has CSRF via /icingaweb2/config/moduledisable?name=monitoring to disable the monitoring module, or via /icingaweb2/config/moduleenable?name=setup to enable the setup module.

criterions.comment: icingaweb2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
